ygData.subject: Re: Ok, now what? (spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if this is broken or not (maybe just on our server), but we did that for 12 hours straight over 2 days and the mino hero never spawned. So I don t
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure if this is broken or not (maybe just on our server), but we did
that for 12 hours straight over 2 days and the mino hero never spawned.

So I don't know what's up with that.

X.


>From: "r cuming" <rcuming@...>
>
> >
> >Mino hero doesn't spawn in the caves I don't think. I think he
> >spawns south of the caves behind the big gears. Seems to be on a
> >2-4 hour spawnn, perhaps killing the wandering Mino's in Steamfont
> >helps?
> >
> >Xilith
> >
>
>
>The Mino Hero spawns by the large gears to the left of the caves. Also to
>get the Hero to spawn faster take out Melderath and his guards (Evil Gnome
>with 2 Mino Guards), as soon as they fall the Hero usually spawns.
>
>Uglugg
>
